posts.content:
Need some inspiration here. My mate says my brown and cream 11 window, should have a nice red leather interior in it! Yes I did say red, sort of classic red. Hope it makes sense.

Was going to have brown and cream as on the outside, now he's put the red thing in my head, I just can't imagine it. The reason I am thinking of it is, he bought a 21 window some 11 years back for about Â£12k... We all laughed at him as he'd sold his Porsche to fund it, he's laughing now!

Anyone have a nice classic red leather interior? Not as dark as oxblood though. Help.. She's going for interior in 3 weeks.

My black and beige (cream-ish in bright light) has a mid red interior.

Curiously, I don't have any better pictures that show the interior and the exterior together....
drifted to a standstill there Kev? nice skidmarks
The last good camping plot left on a rather soggy Victoria Farm, last year. First ever camp in the bus, that was....
